import React from "react"; export default class OrderDetail extends React.Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.state={ orderdetail:[] } } orderid = this.props.match.params.id componentWillMount(){ fetch("/orderdetail/"+this.props.match.params.id+"") .then((res)=>res.json()) .then(rows => this.setState({orderdetail: rows})) } render(){ console.log(this.state.orderdetail[0].orderid) return(
